channel.title: CVE Feed for ITPison -- OMICARD EDM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ITPison -- OMICARD EDM

item.title: CVE-2023-28700|2024-08-02T13:43:23.679Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: OMICARD EDM backend systemâ€™s file uploading function does not restrict upload of file with dangerous type. A local area network attacker with administrator privileges can exploit this vulnerability to upload and run arbitrary executable files to perform arbitrary system commands or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2024-4894|2024-08-01T20:55:10.323Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: ITPison OMICARD EDM fails to properly filter specific URL parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to modify the parameters and conduct Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. This vulnerability enables attackers to probe internal network information.

item.title: CVE-2024-4894|2024-06-11T20:23:58.948Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: ITPison OMICARD EDM fails to properly filter specific URL parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to modify the parameters and conduct Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. This vulnerability enables attackers to probe internal network information.
